src:
整備に出した工場水没、札幌市の消防ヘリ使用不能

05 Nov 2019, 23:01



氾濫した川の水につかり、使用不能となった「さっぽろ１」（札幌市提供）

　札幌市は５日、埼玉県川越市の整備工場で点検整備を受けていた消防ヘリコプター（購入価格約１２億円）が、台風１９号の影響で氾濫した川の水に長時間つかり、使用できなくなったと発表した。修理は不可能という。
　市は消防ヘリを２機保有しており、当面は代替のヘリコプターをリースなどで調達し、運用することにしている。
　発表によると、使用不能になったのは、市が２００９年３月に購入した「さっぽろ１」。１０月１３日未明、整備工場近くの越辺川の堤防が決壊して大量の泥水が格納庫に流入し、機体が水没して重要機器が損傷した。その後の点検で、修理はできないと判断されたという。
　消防ヘリは、年に４～６か月間の点検整備が必要で、「さっぽろ１」は今年９月から半年間の予定だった。もう１機の「さっぽろ２」の点検整備時期は２０年５～１０月となっている。
text:
Factory submerged for maintenance, fire fighting helicopter in Sapporo city cannot be used

05 Nov 2019, 23:01



“Sapporo 1”, which became unavailable due to flooded river water (provided by Sapporo City)

In Sapporo City, a firefighting helicopter (purchased about 1.2 billion yen) that had been inspected and maintained at a maintenance factory in Kawagoe City, Saitama Prefecture on May 5 can be used for a long time in the river water flooded by the influence of Typhoon No. 19 Announced that it was gone. Repair is impossible.
The city has two firefighting helicopters, and for the time being, they will procure and operate alternative helicopters through leasing.
According to the announcement, “Sapporo 1”, which the city purchased in March 2009, became unusable. At dawn on October 13th, the embankment of the Koshibe River near the maintenance plant broke down and a large amount of muddy water flowed into the hangar, causing the aircraft to submerge and damage important equipment. Subsequent inspections determined that repairs were not possible.
The fire helicopter needs to be inspected for 4-6 months a year, and “Sapporo 1” was scheduled for half a year from September this year. The other “Sapporo 2” is scheduled for inspection from May to October 20 years.
